1370: Brandekijn moved to Paternoster straetje.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Liedelde at age 26 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Liedelde, Reynwi, at age 28.
1374: Had a son with Liedelde, Meynolphus, at age 30.
1375: Had a son with Liedelde, Isbrandus, at age 31.
1381: Had a son with Liedelde, Brandekijn, at age 37.
Lost son Meynolphus when Meynolphus was 8 years old.
1385: Had a son with Liedelde, Wlfarde, at age 41.
1386: Had a son with Liedelde, Mewekinus, at age 42.
